net.dempsy.output

Interface OutputInvoker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Container, LockingContainer, NonLockingAltContainer, NonLockingContainer

    public interface OutputInvoker
    This is a server side interface to invoke the @Output methods of MPs. Dempsy will provide an implementation of this interface. During startup, Dempsy will set an instance of OutputInovker to the client output scheduler. Using this instance, client application will call @Output method of MPs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invokeOutput()
      This method will be called by client application to invoke the @Output methods of MPs.
      void setOutputConcurrency(int concurrency)
      If the OutputScheduler wants the container to run the Output pass in a multithreaded manner, then calling this method and setting the concurrency to greater than 1 will do that.

    • Method Detail

      • invokeOutput

        void invokeOutput()

        This method will be called by client application to invoke the @Output methods of MPs. Dempsy will execute the @Output method of all MPs. During the Output execution, MP will not receive any incoming message.

      • setOutputConcurrency

        void setOutputConcurrency(int concurrency)
        If the OutputScheduler wants the container to run the Output pass in a multithreaded manner, then calling this method and setting the concurrency to greater than 1 will do that. This method will usually be called once, at initialization. Each time it's called the Executor used by the container will be recreated with all of its attending threads so this method should not be called with each invokeOutput call.
        Parameters:
        concurrency - is the number of threads to allow Output to be run simultaneously.
